Description: Glass pendant with suspension loop; amber; obverse: diminutive figures of Romulus and Remus beneath the she-wolf who stands to left with backward-turned head.
Bibliographic references: Entwistle & Finney 2013 / Late Antique Glass Pendants in the British Museum (1)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015, Oct 29 – 2016, Feb 7. British Museum, Room 35. Egypt: Faith after the Pharoahs
Condition: Minor iridescence on front and back.
